name: Exam Result
short: Semester 5 results has been released. Check result sheets.
long: Semester 3 results has been released. Check result sheets. Here I attached the result sheets.

name: Semester Time Table
short: Semester 6 time table has been released. Check the sheet.
long: Kindly find the attached in your Email, 4th Semester specialization student list for each department, also find the attached time table for 4th Semester-E/20 batch.

name: Exam Registration
short: Semester 6 Registration has been started. Check the Email.
long: This is to inform you that the Proper candidates shall make payment Rs. 250.00 for renewal of their registration in the 2nd year  in the academic year 2019/2020. Please print the attached form and submit the hard copy along with the payment slip on or before 31st October 2022 at 4.00pm. Payment can be made at Shroff counter/ Finance branch.
